channel.title: Adding a portal

item.title: Adding a portal
item.dc:creator: @itai itai
item.description:
@itai wrote:

Well it depends on were u want portal to go, second why dont u just make a command for ::staff or ::admin etc.

} if ((objectID == 6551) && (objectX == 3090) && (objectY == 3489) && playerRights >= 1) { triggerTele(****, ****, 0); sM("Welcome to staffzone!"); }

Fill in **** of the coordinates

here is and example of a command

} if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("staff") && playerRights >= 1) { toX = 2525; toY = 4776; sM("Welcome to staffzone!"); }

That’s what I use on my server, hope it helped!

Read full topic

item.title: Adding a portal
item.dc:creator: @dragonman2 dragonman2
item.description:
@dragonman2 wrote:

i need to make a admin/mod portal here what the formate on my codeing is
}
if ((objectID == 6551) && (objectX == 3090) && (objectY == 3489)) {
triggerTele(2866, 9944, 0);
sM(“You teleported to godwars, Kill saradomin wizards for kill score”);
} so how will i make a admin portal can someone please help!
